name: Angel Wrap - Hot Pink
description: The Angel Wrap is a wonderful accessory that can turn even jeans and a tank top into an lovely outfit!  You have great versatility in how you wear the Angel Wrap – off the shoulder, draping down your back, over a jacket and angled to one side, over a camisole, over a t-shirt, over a swimsuit, over an evening gown, over a cocktail dress, twisted in front like a scarf, and possibly even around your waist.  Use your own imagination and creativity with your Angel Wrap.

options.name: $37 each when you purchase 2 or more

name: Fiber Wall Hanging
description: Crocheted fiber wall hanging in shades of brown and off white. Great wall hanging that adds some softness and texture to rooms with hardwood floors.

name: Angel Wrap - Black/White
description: The Angel Wrap is a wonderful accessory that can turn jeans and a tank top into an lovely outfit!  You have great versatility in how you wear the Angel Wrap – off the shoulder, draping down your back, over a jacket and angled to one side, over a camisole, over a t-shirt, over a swimsuit, over an evening gown, over a cocktail dress, twisted in front like a scarf, and possibly even around your waist.  Use your own imagination and creativity with your Angel Wrap.  Available in hot pink, lime green, radiant red, summer pastels, jewel tones, blue/green, black. Italian summer.

name: Red Elegance Sharap
description: Crocheted shawl/wrap in rich shades of red. This wrap has a single point that can be worn in front, side or back. The shawl can be scrunched up around the shoulders or allowed to elegantly drape down the body.

name: Brown Elegance Sharap (Shawl/Wrap)
description: Crocheted shawl/wrap in rich shades of brown. This wrap has a single point that can be worn in front, side or back. The shawl can be scrunched up around the shoulders or allowed to elegantly drape down the body.
